Text: how come this file is so large? most dvdrips are around 700mb. please correct my dumbness lol
NE BODY HAVE THE IDEA WHEN ITS BLURAY RIP IS COMING ?? because dvd rips dont have that sharpness ass 720P bluray does

panda_poo


The 700mb rips will only have 2 channel 128kb/s (or lower) audio and a much lower video bitrate.

This rip has 6 channel audio at 384kb/s.  

So basically larger sized rips will look and sound better.  Hope that explains it simply enough for ya.
I've downloaded both the Flawless and the Vision rip and I prefer the Flawless one, picture is sharper here.
finally a dvdrip. screen shots look great :3
